title: My bit on towers: DON'T INCREASE ATTACK SPEED
body: Or if you're going to, take away the stacking buff you gave them. They do a shit ton of damage with the buff they got earlier with the stacking. What they need is more defenses.

replies.body: To the people downvoting, let me ask: Why do you think towers are weak? Is it because of their damage? This is the most damage they've done in a long time. I'll reiterate. It's not their damage that's the problem. It's the fact that they fall over like a house of cards.
Where are people getting these random buffs to champions and whatnot from?

I don't understand exactly what you're trying to ask...

If i'm actually understanding and you really don't know... surrenderat20 website pbe updates

otherwise report me for boosted apeness

> [{quoted}](name=A Bloo Banana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Rn9ubZBf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-01-01T05:26:06.072+0000)
>
> I don't understand exactly what you're trying to ask...
> 
> If i'm actually understanding and you really don't know... surrenderat20 website pbe updates
> 
> otherwise report me for boosted apeness

Well surrender@20 has not had any new pbe updates for a little while. Maybe it got something today but these random buffs has been happening for a little over a week now and surrender@20 didn't had anything. That's why I am asking

That's because the PBE hasn't had any major updates to make them add an entire new page.

It might be worth checking again because they do minor page detail updates without it being shown out there because it's not a whole bundle of updates.


Other than that, i assume the League Subreddit
